dcterms:description: A manually annotated dataset of tweets collected from Twitter, Tumblr, and Reddit, focusing on disclosures of sexual harassment. The dataset contains 5117 tweets, with 1126 annotated as self-disclosures of sexual harassment experiences.
dcterms:title: Sexual Harassment Disclosure Dataset
